did.abstract: Included in the collection are articles and fugitive pieces, 1946-1977; reviews of The cave and the mountain, 1966; correspondence, and perhaps most interesting, some 16 folders of photographs totaling over 300 photos.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Included in the collection are articles and fugitive pieces, 1946-1977; reviews of The cave and the mountain, 1966; correspondence, and perhaps most interesting, some 16 folders of photographs totaling over 300 photos.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Stone wrote The cave and the mountain; a study of E. M. Forster, which was first published in 1966. Edward Morgan Forster was an English novelist, short story writer, essayist and librettist.

accessrestrict.head: Access to Collection
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
